actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Offices of Senators Nunn and Fowler in civil actions.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Offices of Senator Sam Nunn and Senator Wyche Fowler in the cases of Michael A. Nelson v. Senator Sam Nunn's Office and Michael A. Nelson v. Senator Wyche Fowler's Office.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Offices of Senators Nunn and Fowler in civil actions.
